channel.title: Tech Jr
channel.description: Thinking of pursuing a career as a programmer? We did too, and then we did! Lee Warrick and Edwin Otero explore what it's like to break into the Tech field as junior developers as well as how to stay up-to-date on new technology.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about everything
channel.itunes:author: Lee Warrick & Edwin Otero
channel.itunes:summary: Thinking of pursuing a career as a programmer? We did too, and then we did! Lee Warrick and Edwin Otero explore what it's like to break into the Tech field as junior developers as well as how to stay up-to-date on new technology.

item.title: Should you do a coding Bootcamp?
item.description: In this Episode, Lee and Eddie talk about their experiences in a coding Bootcamp. Was it worth it? Do bootcamps deserve the ire of the tech industry?
item.dc:creator: Lee Warrick & Eddie Otero
item.itunes:author: Lee Warrick & Edwin Otero
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tech podcast by Juniors Devs, for Junior Devs!

item.title: Pilot Episode
item.description: In this first episode, we introduce the show and ourselves
item.dc:creator: Lee Warrick
item.itunes:author: Lee Warrick & Edwin Otero
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tech podcast by Juniors Devs, for Junior Devs!

item.title: jQuery!
item.description: In this episode, we talk about jQuery! Should you learn it or should we pronouce jQuery and let it rest in peace?
item.dc:creator: Lee Warrick
item.itunes:author: Lee Warrick & Edwin Otero
item.itunes:subtitle: A Tech podcast by Juniors Devs, for Junior Devs!
